alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 4:01PM CDT until June 16 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Monroe County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 401 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Prairie, or near Aberdeen, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Amory, Aberdeen, Prairie, Hatley, Binford, New Hamilton, Becker, Quincy, Wise Gap, Athens, Strong, East Aberdeen, Muldon and Greenwood Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
